meta.name: description
meta.content: Foxborough Regional Charter School is located in Foxborough, MA.

div.span: Enter to Learn, Exit to Lead!

h2.a: Welcome to Foxborough Regional Charter School

div.strong: Enter to Learn, Exit to Lead!
FRCS values families and sets students up for lifetime success!

div.div: The Foxborough Regional Charter School seeks to provide students an outstanding academic program that prepares students for college in a challenging and stimulating learning environment that instills positive ethical, moral and civic values and prepares students to serve their community as leaders and exemplary citizens.

Our educational philosophy expounds the belief that every student can achieve high levels of academic progress if he/she has the desire to learn. Our teachers follow instructional methods that pace students through well-defined curricula while maintaining expected levels of mastery.

span.span: We offer an enriching and challenging program of studies for all students in grades K-12 that offers a wide range of learning experiences in every content area.

We present students with projects and issues requiring critical thinking, problem-solving, decision-making and real-life applications of their academic studies through our Student Life and Community Service Learning programs.

FRCS embraces its role in establishing a long-term mission and vision for equity and inclusion. We value differences and actively engage our diversity to prepare students for success in a global society.
Students begin learning the Spanish Language in Kindergarten
Students earn national recognition by outperforming on the NSE (National Spanish Exam)
Students have participated in our sister school exchange programs with Handan City, China, and Valencia, Spain
Opportunities for study abroad/community service including: Handan City, China, Valencia, Spain, Costa Rica, Bilbao Spain, Panama, Ghana, Dominican Republic, and Nicaragua.
